code: import*as actionTypes from'./actionTypes';export var setTitle=function setTitle(title){return{type:actionTypes.SET_TITLE,data:{title:title}};};export var setTheme=function setTheme(theme_index){return{type:actionTypes.SET_THEME,data:{theme_index:theme_index}};};export var zoomIn=function zoomIn(x,y){return{type:actionTypes.ZOOM_IN,data:{x:x,y:y}};};export var zoomOut=function zoomOut(x,y){return{type:actionTypes.ZOOM_OUT,data:{x:x,y:y}};};export var zoomReset=function zoomReset(zoomRate){return{type:actionTypes.ZOOM_RESET,data:{zoomRate:zoomRate}};};export var moveReset=function moveReset(){return{type:actionTypes.MOVE_RESET,data:{}};};export var moveXY=function moveXY(x,y){return{type:actionTypes.MOVE_XY,data:{x:x,y:y}};};export var moveXYWhenZoom=function moveXYWhenZoom(x,y){return{type:actionTypes.MOVE_XY,data:{x:x,y:y}};};
